• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.C.DE72Dolutegravir (DTG)Third-drug for PEP in adults and adolescents - Dolutegravir (DTG)
    HIV.C.DE73Raltegravir (RAL)Third-drug for PEP in adults and adolescents - Raltegravir (RAL)
    HIV.C.DE74Darunavir/ritonavir (DRV/r)Third-drug for PEP in adults and adolescents - Darunavir/ritonavir (DRV/r)
    HIV.C.DE75Atazanavir/ritonavir (ATV/r)Third-drug for PEP in adults and adolescents - Atazanavir/ritonavir (ATV/r)
    HIV.C.DE76Lopinavir/ritonavir (LPV/r)Third-drug for PEP in adults and adolescents - Lopinavir/ritonavir (LPV/r)

name: ThirddrugforPEPinadultsandadolescentsCodes
title: Third-drug for PEP in adults and adolescents Codes
